SmilePay services represent a technology platform which helps you, the User, make payments to third parties, the Merchants, through face recognition on top of other multi-factor authentication methods. • YOUR USE OF SERVICES To use most aspects of the services, you must register and maintain an active personal user account of the Services (the "User Accountâ€). In order to register your User Account, you will need to submit certain personal data (herein inclusive biometric data too) to SmilePay. Detailed information related to what personal data you need to share with us and how we manage your personal data you can find at https://smilepay.az/privacy-policy. You are responsible for all activities carried out through your User Account and you may open only one SmilePay account. • HOW IT WORKS The User uses the SmilePay technology to make payment at the merchant's point of sale terminal using the SmilePay app using a face recognition engine. Registered SmilePay Users can shop and pay for goods and services using their face/biometric identification only at Merchants who have a contract with SmilePay LLC and a SmilePay app installed at the point of sale device and integrated Merchant Kiosk Retail System in their stores. Face detection and face recognition is processed on the SmilePay app installed point of sale device and, your photo or video file is not saved on any server for our face recognition process to function (except one image stored in cloud server based in Azerbaijan by 15 days to protect user rights and solve mis payment problems). Your biometric face template is a unique unidentifiable and encrypted data that we use to match your real-time video capture image with your SmilePay account at the point of purchase directly on the SmilePay app installed point of sale device. Account security settings are also checked against SmilePay API for any user or transaction restrictions or fraud alerts on your account or if the face matching service has an issue with accuracy/duplicates. If necessary, the User will need to type in their 4-digit PIN code into the SmilePay app installed point of sale device during checkout for manual confirmation and authorization to process the transaction. SmilePay sends the transaction details to the 3rd Party Payment Gateway for processing (this service is provided by Pasha Bank OJSC). New Users can register a new SmilePay account through our SmilePay App available for free download on iOS or Android smartphone device from both Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Existing Users can manage their SmilePay account via the SmilePay app and add/remove debit or credit cards. Users can add several debit or credit cards (but use one active card) in their SmilePay app, view their profile and update their account information from the app, view transaction history. User – the person that creates a user account on SmilePay platform, meaning the person who is able in certain conditions to buy goods or services from the Merchants enrolled in SmilePay without the need to carry cash, cards or their mobile phones when they go shopping. Merchant – the store or vendor who sells goods or services to the User. Participating merchants have our SmilePay merchant application installed and integrated in their stores. Merchant's bank – the merchant's bank is the destination account for the payment requested from the User's bank account by the terminal using our SmilePay merchant application. User's bank – this is the financial institution that issued the User's bank/credit card and the source of funds involved in the transaction to pay for the goods or services purchased. • ACCESS TO NETWORK AND DEVICES It is your responsibility to gain access to the data network required to use the services.
